UniprotID	Q9H4A5
Accession	Q9H4A5;B1AN09;B7Z6N3;Q9NVK0
EntryName	GLP3L_HUMAN
ProteinName	Golgi phosphoprotein 3-like (GPP34-related protein)
GeneName	GOLPH3L GPP34R
Length	285
Function	Phosphatidylinositol-4-phosphate-binding protein that may antagonize the action of GOLPH3 which is required for the process of vesicle budding at the Golgi and anterograde transport to the plasma membrane.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus; Golgi stack membrane; Golgi apparatus; trans-Golgi network membrane
